Why should I recycle my car?

1. Cash Money

The first benefit of auto recycling is exactly what you’re hoping it is—an opportunity to earn some money.
By recycling your car with Carecycle you can get rid of your aged, non-functional or retiring car,
while puttingextra cash in your pocket.

2. It’s Easy

When you’re dealing with Carecycle, it’s very easy to get your automobile recycled. You simply log in,
and then we arrange a mutually-convenient time to bring it in. Many people are becoming familiar with
auto recycling,and the added convenience certainly makes it an easy decision for them.

3. People Are Becoming More Aware of Auto Recycling

By recycling your vehicle, you get the opportunity to participate in a valuable global recycling program
- in fact; over 12 million vehicles are recycled across North America annually! Thisprevents a significant
amount of oil from being processed in the production of new metal. And while those numbers are pretty
good—we can always use one more.

4. A Positive Impact On The Environment

The fourth and final benefit is the fact that auto recycling has a positive impact on the environment.
The auto recycling business prevents a mass abundance of toxic car fluids from seeping into soil and groundwater.
Instead of auto wrecking yards that crush cars with no regard for the hazardous fluids that spill out from each car,
reputable auto recycling yards like Carcone’s ensure that components like gasoline, batteries, and mercury are
removed from each vehicle.
